alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:29PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact western Winona, southeastern Olmsted, eastern Wabasha and north central Fillmore Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 529 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plainview to near Altura to near Chatfield. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... St. Charles and Altura around 535 PM CDT. Wabasha and Kellogg around 540 PM CDT. Alma, Lewiston, and Buffalo City around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whitewater State Park, Pioneer Campground, County Roads 6 And 33, Whitman, County Roads 28 And 31, Utica, Rattlesnake Ridge, Beaver, State Road 42 And County 14, and Kruger Campground. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 232 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
